A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a standalone film it's great. It's honestly fresh and sets the franchise in a solidly new direction\, whether they wanted to or not (RIP Carrie Fisher). Yet I was a bit let down because a lot of what 7 set up fizzles out (listen to my YouTube review on Drew's Corner for my rants). But  I'm fine with Rian getting his own trilogy considering it will not include any characters we know and thus he can make the series how he wants and he's definitely a great filmmaker.
